reference_example.title: Dynamic Product Reveal - Reference Standard
reference_example.prompt: Dynamic product reveal opens with explosive energy. Camera executes aggressive push-in from wide to extreme close-up over 8 seconds, combined with dramatic 270-degree spiral orbit creating kinetic momentum. OPENING (0-2s): Explosive particle burst transition. Thousands of luminous cyan and white particles materialize from void, converging with magnetic acceleration toward frame center. Particles trail motion blur streaks creating speed lines. High-energy whoosh sound effect synchronized with visual impact. HERO MOMENT (2-4s): Logo SLAMS into frame with confident authority. Bold, oversized sans-serif typography rendered in glossy liquid metal finish with real-time environmental reflections. Logo features dynamic animations: electric pulse waves radiating outward, RGB chromatic glitch effects at 0.2-second intervals, holographic shimmer sweep across letterforms. CAMERA WORK: Aggressive dynamic camera movement. Starts with fast dolly-push reducing focal distance by 60%. Simultaneous counter-clockwise orbital sweep at 35 degrees per second. Camera shake simulation adds handheld documentary energy (subtle 2-pixel vibration). Snap-focus transitions using rapid aperture shifts from f/1.4 to f/8 creating dramatic depth-of-field changes. AUDIO DESIGN: High-energy, beat-driven soundtrack. Opening: deep sub-bass drop (40Hz) with impact boom. Main layer: driving electronic beat at 128 BPM with punchy kicks. Sound FX: sci-fi whooshes synchronized with particle bursts, digital glitch stabs on reveals. COLOR PALETTE: Bold, saturated colors. Primary: electric cyan (HSL: 180°, 100%, 50%), vibrant magenta (HSL: 320°, 100%, 50%). Aggressive color contrast ratio 15:1 for maximum social media thumb-stopping power. PRODUCTION POLISH: Premium broadcast quality. Motion blur calculated at 360-degree shutter. Chromatic aberration on fast movements (3-pixel RGB separation). Final color grade: crushed blacks, boosted saturation (+25%), optimized for Instagram/TikTok compression.
